html:
10.13.17  12:36 pm   bill quick give me a sexy chord progression 

     the sexiness of chords depends on much more than just what the names of the chords are, listed in the order that you used them

10.13.17  10:44 am   Ever thought about using captial letters?

     yes

10.13.17  10:21 am   Do you let people use your music in their own videos?

     no, but some times they are able to do it without me noticing. like for example if i am busy trying to make more of my own videos, with my own music

10.13.17  8:14 am   Did you get anything wrong in your new video that you wish you could change or was it all correct?

     i haven't seen it since it was released

10.13.17  8:11 am   Can you tell me your story?

     i am trying

10.13.17  3:54 am   is the voice an instrument?

     yes

10.13.17  1:39 am   Did you do any research for the soap video?

     no

10.13.17  1:13 am   Why do i always feel like i have to apologize for everything i do

     maybe everything you do is wrong

10.13.17  1:03 am   How should I get revenge on an evil substitute teacher?

     find someone to be your substitute student

10.13.17  12:53 am   what font did you use?

     when

10.13.17  12:16 am   can you help me with the four chords here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n8X9_MgEdCg

     Emin7, Cmaj7, Dadd2, Aadd2

10.12.17  11:32 pm   Do you have any favorite vocal warm-ups?

     doing a bad first take

10.12.17  11:29 pm   Your anagrams page shows 1 error in the console

     a console is not necessary to view the page

10.12.17  11:13 pm   8.11.16  12:29 pm someone help you?

     yes but their recommendation was ultimately not right for me. i went through a barrage of other solutions and eventually found the right one

10.12.17  10:44 pm   are your songs public domain?

     absolutely not

10.12.17  10:10 pm   Do you have any useless skills?

     yes

10.12.17  9:56 pm   why is qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm the order on the computer keyboard?

     that was actually designed to make it harder to type. to slow people down, to prevent key jams on the typewriter. that may sound strange, but i think it's true

10.12.17  9:16 pm   I enjoyed reading books! What about you?

     i can hardly remember them. but i suppose it doesn't matter, because in my opinion reading seems to be much more fun, dynamic, and interesting on the computer

10.12.17  9:15 pm   earth, wind, or fire?

     how about all 3 together, on stage at a concert in the 1970s

10.12.17  9:07 pm   if you had a nickel for all of the dumb questions you have answered since the morning that you are reading this, how rich you you be

     well it would have to go toward paying the salary of the smart-dumb specialist, who would decide whether the questions are smart or dumb. which is a hard, nebulous, and completely pointless useless job which i would never hire anyone for nor do myself

10.12.17  8:55 pm   bill, i'm sure you've heard this a million times, or at least a thousand times before, but anyway, i'm reading through your answers here and i'm getting kind of worried about you. i mean it's great that you work and keep yourself busy and all, but is it worth it?

     yes

      i mean are you content?

     yes

     if not, do you think you would be more fulfilled with friends and perhaps an SO? if you're ok then that's great, i'm just curious, hope i'm not being rude. love you bill. take care

10.12.17  8:18 pm   Have you ever attempted to make palindromes out of anagram requests?

     no

10.12.17  8:08 pm   what's the exact distance where holding a door no longer becomes courteous just strange?

     it's not distance, i think it's time. and i think it's 1 and a half seconds

     also how many dollars in air conditioning are lost due to people feeling obliged to hold open doors

     if no one did it for longer than 1 and a half seconds, that would be actually more efficient than 2 people opening the door separately

10.12.17  8:07 pm   where did you learn to talk

     at home, and in the work place

10.12.17  8:01 pm   have you played a melodica?

     no

     how would you rate your experience?

10.12.17  7:48 pm   Are you gonna be there at the next michael jackson tour?

     no

     sounds like it's gonna be great from what i've heard

10.12.17  7:47 pm   can you categorize dogs

     you can try

10.12.17  7:30 pm   maybe you could do a video about the history of Japan maybe

     seems like a waste of time

10.12.17  7:27 pm   why do american people not put a "u" in colour?

     to save time, and money

10.12.17  7:22 pm   i am running out of sanity where can i get some 

     in the earth's atmosphere, and on its surface

10.12.17  6:42 pm   do you usually sit or stand on the subway?

     stand !!!

10.12.17  6:24 pm   can you make a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song abou t making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song about making a song?

     i think most of my songs are about that

10.12.17  6:16 pm   do you do the animations/drawings for your videos cuz you enjoy it and want to express the song that way or is it more of an obligatory thing just so there's sth "there" and it's a video not just audio? 

     when i do a song without a video, no one finds out about it. they think i haven't done it. "make a song", they say, not knowing i had just made a song. for example, when i made the "movie star" video, everyone thought that was a brand new song. they had no idea that that song had already been released 2 months before. so it is a survival strategy to do the videos, which is too bad because it takes about 4 times longer than the song, to make the video.

10.12.17  5:26 pm   Can you help me come up with some fake song titles that sound like they'd be 'jazz standards'? Here's what I got so far, "Thoughts of You",  "If it's Springtime", and Dreaming of Heather".

     birds of a feather
     memories
     barcelona
     evening dew
     my baby's got two left feet

10.12.17  5:18 pm   What's the best way to study for a test?

     acquire the answer key, and memourize it

10.12.17  5:17 pm   how do i meditate?

     just do nothing, i guess

10.12.17  5:10 pm   how is the world

     pretty good

10.12.17  5:07 pm   Thoughts on pants?

     they are helpful, and useful

10.12.17  4:51 pm   Is your "outside" video a cry for help?

     no

     Are you being held hostage Bill?

     no

10.12.17  4:45 pm   fav steely dan tune?

     the one where donald hates himself

10.12.17  4:43 pm   did you actually write "brooklyn museum" at the brooklyn museum?

     i wrote "write me another" outside the brooklyn museum. then, years later, i did a revise of the song, which starts the same but ends differently, and provides more details about the original writing session, even though the revision was made at a vastly different time and place

10.12.17  4:36 pm   I noticed in the soap Tips video that you wrote "Thabk You" in the store, also that "typo" appears when we submit a question. is it random ? or something like your signature?

     that's a classic, as old as the ground we walk on

10.12.17  4:33 pm   I have a feeling that in your soap tips videos you are not referring to actual soap (you don't rent, taste and get addicted to soap) Are you by any chance talking about drugs (among other things)

     no

10.12.17  4:10 pm   Bill do you think that its possible that grass maybe is not an ok concept 

     nah

10.12.17  4:07 pm   What's Earth day like on Mars?

     it would be hard to even figure out when it is

10.12.17  3:29 pm   How are things going with your next video?

     ok

10.12.17  3:26 pm   10.11.17  1:05 am I would disagree, would you leave off the top end a piano since 95% of keyboard work is done less?

     absolutely, if i was on a very tight budget, and if that meant spending only 40% of what i would have otherwise spent, and still be able to do at least 90% of the important activities. sounds down right adventageous to me

      I am not trying to be antagonistic, but for that fellow I think it's important to get even basic cymbals and a couple toms. There are many videos on youtube for tuning them

10.12.17  3:06 pm   is it comforting to know that you could sell out and make a ton of money at any time if things don't go right

     i think selling in actually creates much higher value in the long run

10.12.17  2:46 pm   Why English?  Why not make up your own language?

     i've done that, but it made me realize that inventing a language is not what gives languages their power

10.12.17  2:40 pm   so telling from your new video, are you obsessed with soap or wot?

     no. in fact, after making a video about something, i would tend to be even less interested in it than i was before, due to the long hours spent staring at it in the video, while working on it.
